gen:link.msg:message: `ExpensesSpentOnObjectives` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesExpensesAllocationObjectivesSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ExpensesSpentOnObjectives')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesExpensesAllocationObjectivesSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ExpensesSpentOnObjectives return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesExpensesAllocationObjectivesSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfExpensesSpentOnObjectivesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesExpensesAllocationObjectivesSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfExpensesSpentOnObjectivesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesExpensesAllocationObjectivesSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfExpensesSpentOnObjectivesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesExpensesAllocationObjectivesSpecificationFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1T1_ChildrenOfExpensesSpentOnObjectivesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
